headline: Judge declines Hobbs request to block AG threats
author: Associated Press
sentences: PHOENIX (AP) — An Arizona judge this week declined Secretary of State Katie Hobbs’s request for an order blocking Attorney General Mark Brnovich from prosecuting her if she temporarily shuts down a candidate signature portal for a required update.
Maricopa County Superior Court Judge Joan Sinclair said the request is “premature” in a ruling issued Wednesday.
A spokeswoman for Hobbs said she will continue with plans to shut down on March 11 the “E-Qual” system.
